meanings.definition: To write or compose in prose.
meanings.sent1: She enjoys prosifying her thoughts into stories.
meanings.sent2: He is prosifying a novel about friendship and adventure.
meanings.sent3: The cat tried prosifying its meows into a song.
meanings.sent4: Her words prosify the emotions into a beautiful melody.
meanings.sent5: Prosifying the memories made them feel more real.

meanings.definition: The act of turning something into prose.
meanings.sent1: His prosifying of the play made it easier to understand.
meanings.sent2: The prosifying of the poem brought out its true meaning.
meanings.sent3: The prosifying of the recipe turned it into a delightful story.
meanings.sent4: Her prosifying of the speech made it sound like a fairy tale.
meanings.sent5: The prosifying of the history book made it more engaging to read.
